Publication

Group Highlights

For a full list of publications and patents can be found at homepage or go to Google Scholar.

Ultra-Wideband Swarm Ranging Protocol for Dynamic and Dense Networks

Nowadays, not only wearable and portable devices but also aerial and ground robots can be made smaller, lighter, cheaper, and thus as large as hundreds of them may form a swarm to participate in a complicated cooperative application, such as searching, rescuing, mapping, and war-battling.

Feng Shan, Haodong Huo, Jiaxin Zeng, Zengbao Li, Weiwei Wu, and Junzhou Luo

IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking 2022 Paper Code

Energy-Efficient General PoI-Visiting by UAV with a Practical Flight Energy Model

Unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) are being widely exploited for various applications. We summarize these UAV applications and formulate a problem, namely the general waypoint-based PoI-visiting problem. Since energy is critical due to the limited onboard storage capacity, we aim at minimizing flight energy consumption.

Feng Shan, Jianping Huang, Runqun Xiong, Fang Dong, Junzhou Luo, and Suyang Wang

IEEE TMC 2023 Paper
